content:
# I successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore into my inventory. Now, I can return to the new stone furnace and insert the iron ore for smelting into iron plates.

# Let's go ahead and insert the iron ore into the furnace.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, new_furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into the new furnace for smelting

# After inserting the iron ore, I will check the status of the furnace to ensure it's processing the iron ore correctly.
print(f"New Furnace status after inserting ore: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the contents of the new furnace
print(f"Updated Inventory after ore insertion: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after adding more iron ore
